solution_line_template: Since Pogo leaves {pogo_prints_per_meter} prints per meter, then over {pogo_distance_meters} meters it would leave {pogo_prints_per_meter}*{pogo_distance_meters}=<<{pogo_prints_per_meter}*{pogo_distance_meters}={pogo_total_footprints}>>{pogo_total_footprints} footprints on the soils of Mars.
Grimzi leaves {grimzi_prints_num} prints per {grimzi_distance_for_prints} feet, or {grimzi_prints_num}/{grimzi_distance_for_prints}={grimzi_prints_per_meter} footprints per meter.

Then over {grimzi_distance_meters} meters, Grimzi leaves {grimzi_prints_per_meter}*{grimzi_distance_meters}=<<{grimzi_prints_per_meter}*{grimzi_distance_meters}={grimzi_total_footprints}>>{grimzi_total_footprints} footprints on the sands of Pluto.

In total, the two creatures will leave {pogo_total_footprints}+{grimzi_total_footprints}=<<{pogo_total_footprints}+{grimzi_total_footprints}={combined_total_footprints}>>{combined_total_footprints} footprints.
